resources.string:
Step 1: Sit the floor with your hands a little behind your hips
 and your legs straight in front of you.

 Step 2: Lift your feet off the floor slowly so that the thigs are
 angled about 45-50 degrees relative to the floor.

 Step 3: stretch you arms alongside the legs, parallel to each other
 and the floor.

 Step 4: Keep the lower belly relatively flat and breathe easily.

 Step 5: Stay this position for about 50-60 seconds.
